ErrorMessage.title: Ho vha na vhukhakhi kha mukhethekanyi :(

RecentSubjects.text: Haseledzani thero kha Talk, kana ni i engedze kha Zwine na Zwi Funesa kana kha bugu ine na i khuvhanganyo.
RecentSubjects.title: U khethekanywa haṋu ha zwenezwino

WorkflowAssignmentModal.confirm: Ni nnyise kha mushumo u tevhelaho!
WorkflowAssignmentModal.content: Ri a ni fhululedza! Ngauri ni khou ita zwavhuḓi, zwino ni nga swikelela iṅwe nḓila ya mushumo. Arali ni tshi takalela u dzula na mushumo wa zwino, ni nga khetha u dzula.
WorkflowAssignmentModal.dismiss: Ni songo dovha na sumbedza hezwi kha ino sesheni
WorkflowAssignmentModal.title: Nḓila Ntswa ya Mushumo I Hone

NotApproved.paragraph: Projeke iyi yo itwa hu tshi shumiswa Muthomi wa Phurojeke ya Zooniverse fhedzi a i athu vha phurojeke ya Zooniverse ya tshiofisi. Mbudziso na mafhungo a elanaho na mushumo uyu o livhiswaho kha Tshigwada tsha Zooniverse a nga kha ḓi sa wana phindulo.

MessageFromResearcher.noMessage: Kha vha kwamane na tshigwada tsha ṱhoḓisiso kha Talk u itela u guda zwo engedzeaho nga ha heyi phurojeke!
MessageFromResearcher.title: Mulaedza u bvaho kha muṱoḓisisi

RecentSubjects.error: Ho vha na vhukhakhi ha u ḓadza thero :(
RecentSubjects.noSubjects: Zwi vhonala unga ahuna muthu we a khomentha kha thero. Iyani kha Talk ni vhe wa u thoma!

ZooniverseTalk.message: Kha vha ambe na tshigwada tsha vhaṱoḓisisi na vhaṅwe vhashumi vha u ḓifunela!
ZooniverseTalk.title: Talk ya Zooniverse
